articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Senior UN Official
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Senior UN Official
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Yong Ho had a talk with Jeffrey Feltman, under-secretary-general of the United Nations, and his party, who paid a courtesy call at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Thursday.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Act Will Face Curse and Censure: GFTUK Spokesman
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Anti-Reunification Act Will Face Curse and Censure: GFTUK Spokesman
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Confederation of Trade Unions and the Federation of Trade Unions of south Korea were going to send a message to the General Federation of Trade Inions of Korea (GFTUK) in congratulation of its 72nd founding anniversary, but it was not realized due to the anti-reunification act of the puppet authorities.
					 The puppet Unification Ministry threatened the Confederation and the Federation to delete expressions like "national meeting for peace and reunification of the country and the improvement of the north-south relations", charging that "national meeting" means "a political event".
					
					 A spokesman for the GFTUK in a statement Thursday denounced this as an unpardonable challenge to the desire and wish of the workers of south Korea and all other Koreans for national reconciliation, unity, peace and reunification and a traitorous act aimed to sever the fraternal ties between the fellow countrymen.
					
					 The puppet authorities even found fault with the title of the national meeting and hindered the dispatch of the congratulatory message. This can not but be considered as an attempt to make the north-south relations the monopoly of the authorities and to stand against the nation's movement for reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The situation clearly proves that nothing has changed from the days of fascist dictatorship by the group of conservative traitors even though there has been a regime change in south Korea, and the new regime has nothing different from the preceding regimes in using despicable and crafty methods as it trumpets about "exchanges" outwardly but hampers the solidarity activities of organizations of people of various social standings in the north and the south behind the scene.
					
					 Greater crime will cause more miserable end.
					
					 The puppet authorities keen on despicable submission toward outsiders and confrontation with the fellow countrymen can never evade curse and censure by the whole nation determined to open up the heyday of nationwide reunification movement.

articles.title: Music and Dance Performance Given in Sariwon City
articles.content:
Music and Dance Performance Given in Sariwon City
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The State Merited Chorus, the Moranbong Band and the Wangjaesan Art Troupe gave a joint music and dance performance in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province from Nov. 30 to Dec. 6.
					 Such songs as "Song Dedicated to Mother Party", "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care" and "We Sing of the Party" were put on the stage.
					
					 The repertoire also included male trio and chorus "Snow Falls on Iron Producing Township", mixed chorus and male chorus "Lark in Miru Plain" and dance "Dash ahead for the Future".
					
					  The atmosphere of the performance revved up when male trio and male chorus "Along the Road of Socialism" and female chorus and male chorus "Let's Keep the Revolutionary Faith to the Death".
					
					 At the turn of each number, audience mounted the stage to present bouquets to the performers while giving loud applauses to them.

articles.title: Technology for Producing Vinyl Chloride Sole Developed
articles.content:
Technology for Producing Vinyl Chloride Sole Developed
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Ryuwon Footwear Factory in the DPRK recently developed a technology for producing vinyl chloride sole in cooperation with a research group of Kim Chaek University of Technology, true to the noble intention of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to supply more quality and smart shoes to the people.
					 The research groups of the factory and university confirmed that carbonic acid gas penetrates well into vinyl chloride in the air and its penetration power grows stronger when it is transmuted into the supercritical state. And, on this basis, they established the technology for producing vinyl chloride sole, the first of its kind in the DPRK.
					
					 After the introduction of this technology, a pair of shoes comes to weigh 30 percent lighter than before and summer sports shoes for women 80g in particular.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Revolutionary Site Souvenir Factory in the DPRK is one of the light industrial factories which have made contribution to the improvement of people's living.
					 Now, the factory produces different shapes and colors of zippers and melamine resin goods and souvenirs.
					
					 Ryo Pyong Ho, manager of the factory, told KCNA that the factory developed more than 30 kinds of new goods this year.
					
					 Metal and plastic zippers made with locally available raw materials are enjoying popularity among bag factories and garment factories, he said, and went on:
					
					 According to the result of general quality examination, their quality is twice higher than the international standard.
					
					 The factory introduced rational plating method to improve the quality of zippers and diversify their kinds, shapes and colors.
					
					 The factory has also produced many kinds of melamine resin goods, utensils, goods for cultural use and souvenirs.
					
					 When visiting the factory in October Juche 105 (2016), respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un said another mass consumer goods producer based on domestic technology and materials emerged, and indicated the tasks and ways for producing more quality consumer goods to the taste of people.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's "New Northern Policy" Is Bound to Fail: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's "New Northern Policy" Is Bound to Fail: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is nowadays crying out for "new northern policy", in the wake of what they called "new southern policy".
					 The puppet authorities are loudmouthed about "economic cooperation" and "balanced diplomacy" with China, Russia and other Eurasian nations pursuant to the "policy".
					
					 They claim that if the "policy" is carried into practice, it would be "greatly helpful to the economic revitalization and security".
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun on Thursday comments that such policy is motivated by the scheme to approach Eurasian nations including the neighboring countries under the plea of "economic cooperation" and woo those countries into the international cooperation in sanctions and pressure on the DPRK and thus attain the aims for "nuclear dismantlement".
					
					 The puppet regime seeks to profit through the double-dealing with the U.S. and other nations under this "policy", but it is an absurd and infeasible calculation, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 Their calculation is to rely on the U.S. in security aspect and depend on the neighboring countries, its rivals, for the economy. But such attempt can not be allowed by their American master because it wants south Korea to depend on it only, in the aspects of security and economy.
					
					 It would be nonsensical for the puppet lackeys faithful to the U.S. to deal with the neighboring countries, even courting its displeasure.
					
					 The "new northern policy" is bound to go bankrupt, being rejected at home and abroad as it is a stop-gap measure by those frightened at the might of the DPRK which is making triumphant advance while foiling the vicious obstructive moves of the imperialist aggressor forces.

articles.title: Release of All Prisoners of Conscience Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Release of All Prisoners of Conscience Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in south Korea reportedly urged the puppet authorities to set free all prisoners of conscience on Dec. 5.
					 The Catholic Priests' Council for Justice in a statement stressed that the release of prisoners of conscience should be delayed no longer to remove the evils and realize justice.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Committee for Promoting the Release of Prisoners of Conscience called a press conference in Seoul and published a declaration on the situation in the name of people from different walks of life including civic and social, religious and labor circles. It demanded that the release of prisoners of conscience, the first step for removing the evils, be implemented within this year.

articles.title: S. Korea: Teachers Union Declares Hunger-Strike
articles.content:
S. Korea: Teachers Union Declares Hunger-Strike
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Teachers Union of south Korea held a press conference outside the "government" building in Seoul on Dec. 4, declaring a hunger-strike in demand of the withdrawal of notice on outlawing the union, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers at the conference said that the union has been outlawed for four years and the present chief executive is turning away his face from removing the educational evils by the preceding conservative regime.
					
					 They stressed that they would surely get the decision on outlawing the union repealed within this year.
					
					 The union sent a written opinion made by 1,728 civic and public organizations supporting the union to the Chongwadae on the same day.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Drill Complicates Regional Situation: Russian Vice Foreign Minister
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Drill Complicates Regional Situation: Russian Vice Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Igor Morgulov, vice foreign minister of Russia, in his address to an international forum on Tuesday termed the on-going U.S.-south Korea joint aerial drill unjust.
					 He said the aerial drill, kicked off on Monday, will only complicate the regional situation.
					
					 Noting the atmosphere of war is actually lingering on the Korean peninsula, he termed the DPRK's recent ICBM test-fire a response to the U.S. acts of aggression around the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iceland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Iceland
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Reykjavik, Iceland, on November 30.
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, was elected chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Different Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- Newspapers of different countries carried special write-ups between Nov. 7 and 27 to commemorate the 6th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's demise.
					 The Congolese paper Le Patriot devoted one whole page to a photo of Kim Jong Il and an article, which said:
					
					 Thanks to the benevolent politics of leader Kim Jong Il, the people's interests have been strictly regarded as the standard for all the lines and policies in the DPRK and the unity of the whole society where all the people are united as one in mind around the leader has been remarkably consolidated.
					
					 His sense of responsibility for the destiny of the people, sense of duty to provide the people with happiness and heartfelt and warmest love for the people made leader Kim Jong Il's career so great and noble.
					
					 The Pakistani paper Election Times reported about the Juche idea, the political philosophy of Kim Jong Il, saying:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il made public classical works such as "Socialism Is a Science" and "Abuses of Socialism Are Intolerable" to prove the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and the inevitability of its victory.
					
					 Among his feats the Songun politics should be regarded as the most valuable.
					
					 Thanks to the politics, the DPRK's military muscle has remarkably strengthened and it has demonstrated its might as a military power no formidable enemy can dare to provoke.
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Daily Folk said that Kim Jong Il's whole life was like raging flame, telling in detail about his high-intensity forced march for field guidance.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Censure U.S. Re-listing of DPRK as "State Sponsor of Terrorism"
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Censure U.S. Re-listing of DPRK as "State Sponsor of Terrorism"
 Pyongyang, December 7 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea released a joint statement on Nov. 22 in denunciation of the U.S. re-listing of the DPRK as a "state sponsor of terrorism."
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK is consistent in its stand to oppose all sorts of terrorism and support for it.
					
					 The U.S. keen on bringing down independent countries, massacring civilians and committing terrorism is just the worst terrorist nation and sponsor.
					
					 U.S. President Trump, a psychopath, recently cried out for "totally destroying" the DPRK.
					
					 The re-designation of socialist Korea of Juche as "state sponsor of terrorism" was prompted by a sinister political purpose to bring down the country and occupy the whole Korean peninsula.
					
					 The U.S., the kingpin of all sorts of terrorism, is not entitled to act like an "international judge against terrorism" and brand other countries as "state sponsor of terrorism" at its will.

articles.title: Ri Yong Ho se reune con el subsecretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Ri Yong Ho se reune con el subsecretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Ri Yong Ho, departio el dia 7 en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el subsecretario general de la ONU, Jeffrey Feltman, y su comitiva que le hicieron una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Rubricado en Moscu tratado entre Corea y Rusia
articles.content:
Rubricado en Moscu tratado entre Corea y Rusia
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 5 en Moscu el tratado sobre la extradicion del condenado a la privacion de libertad entre la RPDC y la Federacion Rusa.
					En la ceremonia de firmas, estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana la delegacion del Tribunal Central dirigida por su presidente Kang Yun Sok y el embajador coreano en Rusia, Kim Hyong Jun, y por la rusa, el ministro de Justicia, Alexandr Konovalov, y otros funcionarios interesados.
					
					Kang y Alexandr suscribieron el pacto.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX condena disparates anti-RPDC de los politicos estadounidenses
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX condena disparates anti-RPDC de los politicos estadounidenses
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En exclusiva con la ACNC concedida el dia 6 en relacion con que ultimamente, las altas figuras politicas de EE.UU. pronuncian palabras provocativas a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio la siguiente respuesta:
					 Mientras se libra en la Peninsula Coreana el ejercicio aereo conjunto de mayor dimension de la historia contra nuestro pais, los politicos estadounidenses de algo rango dan por estos dias los movimientos sospechosos como decir por turno disparates belicosos.
					
					  El asesor de Seguridad Nacional de la Casa Blanca y un senador republicano dijeron que se aumenta cada dia la "posibilidad de guerra con el Norte de Corea", se cerca cada vez mas a la opcion de "ataque preventivo" y hay que evacuar a los familiares de las tropas norteamericanas estacionadas en el Sur de Corea.
					
					  En cuanto a ese discurso conflictivo, no cabe otra interpretacion que se trata de un mensaje de que la RPDC debe prepararse para el estallido de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Para colmo, el director de la CIA incurrio en otro acto provocativo acusando atrevidamente hasta a la Direccion Suprema, corazon de nuestro pais.
					
					Este hecho es una expresion de la astuta intencion de EE.UU. de obligarnos a tomar la medida de reaccion intransigente y provocar a toda costa, tomandola por pretexto, la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Debido a las alocuciones belicosas de las altas figuras politicas de EE.UU. que se escuchan justamente cuando los seguidos ejercicios de guerra nuclear de gran dimension crean en la Peninsula Coreana un estado supertenso que puede extenderse a la guerra en cualquier momento, esta se va haciendo ya un hecho consumado y lo unico que falta es cuando se desatara ella. 
					
					Las palabras belicosas de los colaboradores cercanos de Trump y sus imprudentes movimientos militares evidencian que la actual administracion norteamericana esta pasando en orden por las etapas de accion para provocar, cueste lo que cueste, la guerra en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					El mundo debera distinguir bien quien es el responsable de agravacion de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y quien es el que perturba la paz y la estabilidad del mundo.
					
					EE.UU. anuncia casi todos los dias la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, hecho que hace levantarnos la guardia.
					
					No deseamos la guerra, pero jamas la eludiremos. Si EE.UU. desata por fin la guerra nuclear juzgando mal nuestra paciencia, le haremos pagarlo muy caro con nuestras inagotables fuerzas armadas nucleares que hemos consolidado hasta la fecha.
					
					A EE.UU. le convendria actuar con control y prudencia si no quiere morirse quemado en el fuego prendido por si mismo.

articles.title: Portavoz del CC de la FGSC condena la desautorizacion del envio de mensaje
articles.content:
Portavoz del CC de la FGSC condena la desautorizacion del envio de mensaje
Pyongyang, 7 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, debido a la conducta anti-reunificacion de las autoridades titeres surcoreanas, la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS) y la Federacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (FSS) no pudieron enviar un mensaje a la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea para felicitarle con motivo del aniversario 72 de su fundacion.
					 Cuestionando injustamente que en el mensaje hay la expresion "congreso pannacional por la paz y la reunificacion de la patria y el desarrollo de las relaciones Norte-Sur", el Ministerio de Unificacion del Sur de Corea impuso tacharla a las entidades sindicales surcoreanas bajo el pretexto de que el congreso pannacional es un "acto politico".
					
					  Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Central de la FGSC publico el dia 7 una declaracion calificandolo de desafio imperdonable al deseo de todos los coreanos, incluyendo los obreros surcoreanos, sobre la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion, la paz y la reunificacion y de acto antinacional y anti-reunificacion tendente a romper hasta los lazos consanguineos entre los connacionales.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas impidieron el envio del mensaje de felicitacion cuestionando hasta el nombre del congreso arriba mencionado, lo cual no es mas que el intento de obstaculizar a toda costa el movimiento por la reunificacion  convirtiendo las relaciones intercoreanas en cosa monopolizada por las autoridades, condena la nota y prosigue:
					
					  La realidad demuestra claramente que a pesar de reemplazo del "poder" en el Sur de Corea, no hay ningun cambio en comparacion con el periodo de la dictadura fascista de los conservadores surcoreanos. Evidencia ademas que si bien el actual "poder" preconiza el "intercambio" en lugares publicos, es identico a sus antecesores en usar los metodos astutos y crueles para impedir las actividades solidarias de las entidades de distintos estratos del Norte y el Sur.
					
					  Mientras se abulte el expediente criminal, esto le costara mas caro y tragico.
					
					  Las autoridades surcoreanas, enloquecidas por la sumision a las fuerzas foraneas y la confrontacion fratricida, no evitaran la maldicion y condenacion de todos los coreanos que quieren abrir la era dorada del movimiento pannacional por la reunificacion.
